entry.title: Western Kangoulu Cultural Artefacts
entry.summary: Design Concept - To create an educational booklet to display and interact with Western Kangaulu cultural artefacts. This will utilise…
entry.content:
Design Concept - To create an educational booklet to display and interact with Western Kangaulu cultural artefacts. This will utilise artefact photography and photogrammetry.  

Design Photography & Photogrammetry Matthew Haynes

Client  Western Kangoulu / Kestel Coal

entry.title: Barada Kabalbara Yetimarala People Strategic Plan
entry.summary: Design Concept - To represent Barada Kabalbara Yetimarala's (BKY) strategic goals booklet by developing a brand image. BKY are people…
entry.content:
Design Concept - To represent Barada Kabalbara Yetimarala's (BKY) strategic goals booklet by developing a brand image. BKY are people of the inner Australian landscape.

Design Matthew Haynes

Client Barada Kabalbara Yetimarala

entry.title: Everick Foundation Annual Report
entry.summary: Everick Foundation's mission is to create pathways for Indigenous communities to engage with culture and heritage on Country. We facilitate…
entry.content:
Everick Foundation's mission is to create pathways for Indigenous communities to engage with culture and heritage on Country. We facilitate community-led initiatives in capacity building, education, research and creative solutions. We foster collaborations to support community aspirations, shared understandings, and visual storytelling about heritage.
